data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ferreira, Cláudio P., Pedroso, Denis Rafael, Kury, Adriano B. (2005): A new species of Metavononoides from the Brazilian Atlantic Forest (Arachnida: Opiliones: Cosmetidae). Zootaxa 1087: 45-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170503
